info.name: Resumate
info.description: These are the API's that are provided by resumate.

request.description: Test API to ensure that the backend is up

Login into the user's account. This API request has two parameters:

- email: Email Id of the user
    
- password: Password of the user

Sign's up a new user. This API request has two parameters:

- email: Email Id of the user
    
- password: Password of the user
    
- firstName: User's first name
    
- middleName: User's middle name
    
- lastName: User's last name

url.raw: http://localhost:8080/user/getContent?prompt=What careers can i get into with a degree in Computer Science

query.value: What careers can i get into with a degree in Computer Science

request.description:
Generate text-content based on a given prompt. The request should have a single parameter

- prompt: A prompt with which the AI should generate content

Generate content for a cover letter for a given job description. The body of the request should have 2 parameters :-

- userId: Id of the user corresponding to the database
    
- jobDescription: The job description of the position the user is applying to

Creates a cover letter in a PDF format for a given job description based on the user's qualifications.  
The body has 2 parameters :-

- userId: Id of the user corresponding to the database
    
- companyName: Name of the company
    
- jobDescription: The job description of the position the user is applying to

Creates a PDF format resume for the user. The request has 1 parameter.

- userId: Id of the user corresponding to the database
